name: SUMO (itch) (Rydrako)
description:
SUMO is an endless physics-based yōkai slaying FPS!

Battle hordes of yōkai in the arena! The only way for you or your enemies to be defeated is by falling into the abyss.

Unlock unique weapons to suit your play style such as a machine-shotgun, firework launcher, or a cyclone blaster. You also have a grapple you can propel yourself with!

Survive as long as you can and participate in the online leaderboard! Show off your skill by completing challenging achievements to unlock cool profile banners.

The demo version of the game will receive the following free updates*:

*Update contents subject to change; release dates TBD.
